channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Example Visulisations
item.description: Here are some examples of the visualisations I made - China - Male vs Female Population - A visualisation in R using the highcharter library to visualise the the growth of male and female population in China overtime. (Press play button at the bottom). Data Source - IHME Global Burden of Disease Population Estimates India - Domestic Violence Quiz - A visualisation to understand the physical abuse against women in India.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Computer Science graduate from Ashoka Univerity with a keen interest in data analysis and machine learning. This is a simple website I made to showcase some visualisations I created.
